translated: Edgar Degas, born July 19, 1834 and died September 27, 1917 in Paris, was a French painter and sculptor, usually attached to the movement of Impressionism.
original: Edgar Degas, né le 19 juillet 1834 et mort le 27 septembre 1917 à Paris, est un peintre et sculpteur français, le plus souvent rattaché au mouvement de l'impressionnisme.
